My Work

Check out some of my projects...

Wee.db.ase

Project Github

Created a cannabis database and forum in a seven-day sprint. Whether youâ€™re new to cannabis, a medical marijuana patient, or a seasoned consumer, Wee.db.ase is a perfect place for you! Technologies used: MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js, Axios, CSS3 and Semantic UI.

Postr

Project Github

This was a group project in which we created a single page app in a four-day sprint. If signed in, users can create, edit and delete their posts, see other users posts in the main feed and chat with users online. Technologies used: Node.js, Express, JavaScript, jQuery, JSON, Bootstrap, API, HTML5, CSS3.

AAroundLA

Project Github

Goal for this project was to give users a quick and easy way to find and rate AA meetings in their area. It was done in a five-day sprint. Technologies used: Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, Heroku, Bootstrap, HTML5 and CSS3.

Finger Smasher

Project Github

Created a two-player game using HTML5, CSS3 & JavaScript in a four day sprint. Arrows quickly flash on the screen and users have to press the corresponding arrow key as many times as it blinks.
